issuetype.description: An improvement or enhancement to an existing feature or task.
issuetype.name: Improvement

fields.description: Currently Plasma list() method is not implemented in Java code. Implement PlasmaClientJNI.list() interface and add some UT.

comments.body: This is the first Plasma JNI issue we've seen action on in some time. Do you intend to help maintain this code?
